# Alicorn Lance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]] (Lurue)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** Horn of force

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Silver Marches web enhancement (WotC), pg. 5

You create a horn of force on your forehead, similar in size and shape to a unicornâ€™s horn. At any time up until the spell expires, you may launch the horn at a single target as a free action. Striking the target requires a successful touch attack. If the horn hits, it is destroyed and deals 3d6 points of force damage to the target creature and outlines it in silver-colored *[[Faerie Fire (Spell)|faerie fire]]* for the remaining duration of the spell. If it misses, the spell dissipates.
#Sources/Silver-Marches #Spell-Resistance/Yes #Spell-Level/Cleric-3 #Spell-Range/Close--25-ft----5-ft--2-levels- #Spell-Level/Druid-3 #Spell-School/Evocation #Spell-Descriptor/Force #Saving-Throws/None

**GM Note**

In the Forgotten Realms campaign setting, this spell is favored by druids who worship Lurue.
